attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Can have access /choice to treatments offered by Mental Health SERVICE proffessionals /units/private/NHS in UK WITHOUT BOUNDARY RESTRICTIONS BEING IMPOSED ON OUR CHOICES.INCLUDING THE RIGHT TO BE TREATED BY OUR CULTURAL ETHNIC RACE/SEXUALITY/RELIGION;BEING INCLUDED IN OUR CHOICES WHERE APPROPRIATE.At least 3 choices in the UK as a whole.By using this method the Gov could illiminate the rejects in the Mental Health feild who fail the patients and society;creating a progressive mental health system in the Uk.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
